title: MEART
brief_description: Located at the School of Anatomy and Human Biology, University of Western Australia. The SymbioticA Research Group (Sarg) has collaborated with the Laboratory for Neuroengineering at Georgia Tech in the US for the last 3 years. The collective is: Oran Catts, Research Director; Ionat Zurr, New Media; Guy Ben-Ary, Biological Artist; Phil Gamblin, Artist; Dr Stuart Bunt, Founder & Scientific Director.

production_dates.notes: MEART will operate from a live web-feed between Australia and Atlanta for the first two-weeks of '2004'. For the remainder of the show MEART will play from "memories".
